name: 2018/11/08 Lunch
description: This '2018/11/08 Lunch' recipe is perfect for those looking for a high-protein, high-fiber meal that doesn't compromise on taste. Featuring a delightful mix of carrots, broccoli, and the savory delight of Longganisa, spiced with fresh thyme, it's a healthified twist on your midday meal that promises to be both nutritious and delicious.

recipeInstructions.text: Wash the carrots and broccoli under cold water. Pat them dry with a paper towel.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Cut the carrots into bite-sized pieces and chop the broccoli into florets.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Place the carrots and broccoli on a baking sheet. Drizzle with olive oil and sprinkle with fresh thyme. Toss to coat evenly.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Roast in the preheated oven for 25 minutes, or until the vegetables are tender and slightly caramelized.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5

recipeInstructions.text: While the vegetables are roasting, remove the casing from the Longganisa and form into small patties.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 6

recipeInstructions.text: Cook the Longganisa patties in a skillet over medium heat for about 10 minutes, turning once, until fully cooked.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 7

recipeInstructions.text: Serve the roasted carrots and broccoli alongside the cooked Longganisa patties.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 8
